channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NCAA Approves Uniform Patches, Opening New Revenue and Payer Play Possibilities
item.description: The NCAA unearthed another revenue stream when Division I leaders approved patches for uniforms, in a move that could fund athletic departments lookin...

item.title: Bon Voyage, Ethan Nwaneri! Arsenal Send Youngster On Loan to Marseille
item.description: Arsenal have confirmed Ethan Nwaneri's loan move to Marseille for the rest of the season. The 18-year-old has been limited to 12 appearances for the G...

item.title: Could Cristiano Ronaldo Retire After Potential New Contract Through 2027?
item.description: A retirement plan for Cristiano Ronaldo has been teased as Saudi Pro League officials reportedly line up 50 big-name players to join CR7 in the Middle...

item.title: Texas QB Arch Manning Undergoes Foot Surgery, Expected Back for Spring Practice
item.description: Texas QB Arch Manning underwent minor foot surgery, but he's expected back for Longhorns' spring practice.

item.title: Welcome Back! Eric Bieniemy Replaces Matt Nagy as Chiefs Offensive Coordinator
item.description: The Kansas City Chiefs hired Eric Bieniemy as their offensive coordinator, reuniting him with Andy Reid and Patrick Mahomes.

item.title: Scoring is up, freshmen are elite and more storylines shaping men's hoops
item.description: The good (Nebraska), not-so-good (Kentucky) and interesting (dominant freshmen) of the 2025-26 season so far.

item.title: Midseason lessons for all 30 NBA teams: Trade dramas, standings surprises dominate the first half
item.description: What have we learned about every team throughout the first half of 2025-26? Tim Bontemps canvasses the league.

item.title: Who should've made the top 10? What were the biggest surprises?
item.description: Our experts give their thoughts on the top 100 list.

item.title: Ranking the 100 best college football players from the 2025 season
item.description: Which players take the top spots? After an obvious choice at No. 1, the decisions weren't easy. Our experts tried to crack the code.

item.title: 8 years, 5 schools and a career-threatening condition: The story of Tyon Grant-Foster
item.description: From heart troubles to an eligibility battle, here's how the Gonzaga forward kept his career alive.
